description: Mark Cavendish retains the leader's jersey at the Dubai Tour after finishing second in Thursday's second stage.
title: Mark Cavendish: Manx rider retains lead at 2015 Dubai Tour
title_page: Mark Cavendish: Manx rider retains lead at 2015 Dubai Tour - BBC Sport
